img_summary: The image depicts the "Buddha's Eyeball," a rare item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as an eyeball extracted from chanting Buddha heads found in the Fright Cliff area of Yellow Wind Ridge. Players can collect six of these items from scattered Buddha heads and use them on a rock in the Stone Vanguard boss arena at Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform to summon Shigandang, a secret boss in Yellow Wind Ridge.
